DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety tolerability four dose oral vesnarinone patient advance HIV disease .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Multiple Doses Vesnarinone Advanced HIV Disease
DOC.detailed_description: Fourteen patient per dose level receive vesnarinone 1 4 dos 12 week . At least seven patient give dose level must complete 4 week treatment dose escalated subsequent patient .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Concurrent Medication : Allowed : Chemoprophylaxis Pneumocystis carinii , candida , mycobacteria , opportunistic infection . Acyclovir 14 day acute herpes outbreak . Patients must : Documented HIV infection . CD4 count 50 300 cells/mm3 . No active opportunistic infection . No fever , diarrhea , Herpes zoster . Exclusion Criteria Coexisting Condition : Patients follow symptoms condition exclude : Clinically significant current cardiac disease , include patient exhibit long QTC syndrome EKG screen abnormal cardiothoracic ratio chest xray baseline . Active malignancy ( cutaneous Kaposi 's sarcoma cutaneous basal cell carcinoma situ carcinoma cervix ) . Concurrent Medication : Excluded : Antiretroviral agent , include ddI , ddC , AZT , d4T . Immunosuppressive agent . Investigational HIV drugs/therapies include vaccine . Interferon immunomodulating agent . Corticosteroids ( topical ) . Hematopoietins . Megestrol acetate . Agents know cause neutropenia . Trimethoprim/sulfamethoxazole excess 160 mg trimethoprim 800 mg sulfamethoxazole thrice weekly . Cytotoxic chemotherapy . Concurrent Treatment : Excluded : Radiation therapy . Patients follow prior condition exclude : Prior history cardiac disease . History agranulocytosis severe ( grade 3 worse ) druginduced neutropenia document abnormality granulocyte function . Prior Medication : Excluded : AZT , ddI , ddC , d4T , nucleoside analog antiretroviral therapy within 14 day prior study entry . Prior cytotoxic chemotherapy . Acyclovir herpes prophylaxis within 48 hour prior study entry . Prior Treatment : Excluded within 30 day prior study entry : Erythropoietin , transfusion , blood product use . Radiation therapy ( include electron beam irradiation ) . Active use illicit drug ( specifically cocaine , amyl nitrate , heroin , cardioactive agent ) .
